title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1320/93 of 28 May 1993 fixing for the 1993 marketing year the reference prices for apricots
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1320/93 of 28 May 1993 fixing for the 1993 marketing year the reference prices for apricots
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1993 marketing year, the reference prices for apricots falling within CN code 0809 10 00, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
June (1 to 10): 106,26,
(11 to 20): 93,94,
(21 to 30): 82,07,
July: 73,15.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 May 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 69, 20. 3. 1993, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(5) OJ No L 79, 1. 4. 1993, p. 54.
(6) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 22.
(7) OJ No L 57, 10. 3. 1993, p. 18.
